content.prompt: The agreements made in the excerpt best reflect which of the following concerns in the United States during this period?

choices.label: How to support western settlers beyond the Appalachian Mountains
How to avoid the establishment of political parties
Whether to assist the French in their war against Great Britain
Whether to allow slavery to expand into new territories

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
